mapper.insert: insert into t_order (id, member_id, orderDate, orderType, orderStatus, setmeal_id) VALUES (#{id},#{memberId},#{orderDate},#{orderType},#{orderStatus},#{setmealId})
mapper.select: select f1.orderType as orderType, f1.orderDate orderDate, f2.name as member, f3.name as setmeal from t_order f1, t_member f2, t_setmeal f3 where f1.member_id = f2.id and f1.setmeal_id = f3.id and f1.id = #{orderId}
